name: COGZ
slogan: COGZ is a trade only marketplace for surplus and imperfect produce in the food industry
description:
COGZ is an online marketplace that connects farmers and growers with surplus and imperfect produce directly to food and beverage manufacturers saving them time and money whilst increasing crop yield and preventing food waste.

COGZ is a finalist of Pitch at Palace 11.0, part of the Allia Future 20 and is currently taking part in the EIT Food and Mass Challenge Accelerator.

Working with over 60 farmers and growers in the UK and across Europe and New Zealand COGZ is transforming the way fresh produce is bought and sold. The COGZ platform enables growers to find a buyer for their surplus produce reducing food waste in primary production and enabling manufacturers to create more sustainable products for the end consumer using rescues produce.

COGZ are looking to connect with anyone interested in sustainability, fresh produce and agriculture. If you would like to hear more about us or would like to chat please get in touch.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
COGZ is an agritech startup looking for a tech lead to join the team to help us build an online marketplace that is transforming the fresh produce supply chain whilst massively reducing food waste.

In 10 months since launching our MVP we have been nominated for a host of awards, are revenue generating, have a growing customer base across Europe, and we are now looking for a technical partner to take our product to the next level.

We are looking for an ambitious and hardworking developer who is looking to make their mark on the startup world and really develop the company and grow their skills in a flexible and encouraging environment. Must have experience with our tech stack and bonus points for experience working in agriculture or food sector.

Our current stack is :

React JS
Ruby on Rails
HTML5
CSS3
AWS
NGINX
PostgreSQL

You would be joining an experienced team of founders and have your chance to really make your mark on a startup and be part of the founding team.

Position based in London but flexible around working schedule and times. Get in touch with why you want the role and why it is perfect for you!

jobs.title: Operations intern
jobs.description:
COGZ are looking for an intern who is looking to gain real hands on experience from a startup in the early stages of growth.

The role will involve working closely with the CEO in the following areas:

Sales and new business development
CRM management 
Customer services
Social media and marketing
Analysis and reporting

More than a specific role this position will involve assisting where needed and the applicant being flexible with the role evolving and adapting as the days progress.
